name: Sous l'océan
description:
--------CONTROLS--------

Left click to dive , release to come up at the surface.



--------DESCRIPTION--------

Sous l'océan is a game made in 3 hours for the game jam. 
that was my first jam and that was a good experience! 

The game is pretty simple, you have to get treasures and make the highest score as possible, beware of pressure !

Game designer & programmer : @RMGKH https://www.instagram.com/rmgkh/

Art : @LittleBigInk ( https://www.instagram.com/littlebig.ink/ )
